title: What Champion should I buy next?
body:
So I recently got {{champion:245}} and even though I'm fairly new to him I have been getting tons of S ranks and A ranks. 

I normally play ADC champs like {{champion:67}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:29}} .
I have no idea who else to buy. I've foudn that all these champs are really mobile and have lots of burst damage. 
I am looking at {{champion:91}} , {{champion:105}}  or even {{champion:498}} but I'm not sure if they are too hard for my elo (Silver V).

Pls help me find a easy, mobile champ to play.

-Jacca

replies.body:
Depends on the roles.
For easy to play adc you may want to consider Corki.
For easy to play assassin you may want to consider Nocturne.
For easy to play mage you may want to consider Ziggs.
For easy to play Support you may want to consider Thresh.
thresh isnt an easy play support. lulu is.

None. Save for the preseason when all your ip is turned into BE and you can buy skins and stuff with it.

Zed is mobile like no tomorrow and is the only assassin who doesn't have delayed burst, not that hard to play and do well on either.

Is it actually worth it just to save your ip until november? 
I don't want to head into season 8 ripped off my  IP and Blue Essence.

Maybe I can just spend all of my IP of champ shards and disenchant them
the conversion rate is 1:1, so if you have 8000ip you will get 8000BE, plus extra from runes and stuff
So now i have 13k BE, what champ should I get?

kayn, kha, kled

Or zoe in a week or 3

____

Talon's basics are easy and his lv 2 first blood potential is strong, but he struggles to assassinate targets unless far ahead or from a bush at melee range.

Fizz is braindead broken easy in silver elo

Xayah is trash with the new rune system, dont touch it
Hmm.. okay. I got talon before preseason and he's pretty good. Idk if I should get fizz, but i might get Ahri.

If you want a highly mobile, high burst damage, easy to play champ, buy Yasuo. I saved up my IP and I bought him and now I main him. He's so mobile and building Phantom Dancer and Infinity Edge gives him 100% crit chance, so you'll 2 shot any squishy with your Q. At the start I thought he would be really hard to play but I got the hang of him in about 1-2 weeks (got a penta yesterday :D) and he's super fun to play. BTW Yaauois good in any elo and all his skins look sick. Hope this helps :)
